name: Taiwan Love Story⁵
storyline:
You're a college senior studying humanities at a university, and during a camping event held by your department, you meet five women from different parts of Taiwan. While you're hanging around the bonfire, a mysterious kiss leaves you lovestruck and yearning for more. Inspiration strikes, and you finally settle on a thesis topic: "The Binary Equation of Love and Happiness."

In order to both finish your thesis and find true love, you set out on an adventure around the island. Along the way, you meet up with the women and experience a series of bittersweet romantic encounters bursting with youthful naivety. Your very own Taiwanese love story is about to begin...
summary: "Taiwan Love Story ⁵" is a romantic interactive novel. To write a thesis on love, you meet girls from different parts of Taiwan. As you conduct your academic research, you gradually become captivated by them, leading to a series of sweet, bittersweet, and complex romantic encounters.
